product_name: PS4 Cyberpunk 2077 Standard Edition
description:
Do note Price is not confirmed and may be subjected to change. Any difference will be refunded through Discount Vouchers only usable on our website.

  This purchase will also be playable on PS5

THE REAL YOU IS NOT ENOUGH


About the Game

Cyberpunk 2077 is an open-world, action-adventure story set in Night City, a megalopolis obsessed with power, glamour and body modification. You play as V, a mercenary outlaw going after a one-of-a-kind implant that is the key to immortality. You can customize your character‚Äôs cyberware, skillset and playstyle, and explore a vast city where the choices you make shape the story and the world around you.


PLAY AS A MERCENARY OUTLAW

Become a cyberpunk, an urban mercenary equipped with cybernetic enhancements and build your legend on the streets of Night City.


Use a variety of upgradeable weapons, hacking skills and body-enhancing implants to become the best hired gun in town.
Take down everyone, from corporate security and the police, to gangs and other mercenaries, in order to gain the street cred needed to access better jobs.
Spend your hard-earned money on weapons and cyberware or have fun buying cars, motorcycles, and outrageous clothing.

LIVE IN THE CITY OF THE FUTURE

Enter the massive open world of Night City, a megalopolis that sets new standards in terms of visuals, complexity and depth.


Journey through a city that‚Äôs larger than life, explore gang-ridden warzones, trade in its bustling downtown, and raid corporate havens.
Make deals with sleazy fixers, desperate celebrities, and renegade artificial intelligences ‚Äî all fighting tooth and nail to make it big in Night City.
Make choices in your journey and watch the story change based on your actions.

STEAL THE IMPLANT THAT GRANTS ETERNAL LIFE

Take the riskiest job of your life and go after a prototype implant that is the key to immortality.


Push yourself to the absolute limit to get your hands on Night City‚Äôs most valuable implant ‚Äî a prototype chip that can make you live forever.
Face corporate leaders, underground hustlers, and all of the most feared people in Night City ‚Äî those who will do everything in their power to possess the prototype chip.
Choose how to handle this enormous power and who you wish to become.

product_name: Gangs Of Cyberpunk 2077 Badge Standard Edition Set of 8pcs For Clothes Laptop Backpack
description:
Gangs Of Cyberpunk 2077 Badge Standard Edition - Set of 8pcs

Included in the set (8pcs badges):

Tyger Claws - Japantown is Tyger Claws territory. These tattooed, katana-wielding gangsters know how to squeeze cash from overstimulated pleasure seekers looking for a 'good time'.

Maelstrom - Vying to become more machine than man, consequences be damned, members of the Maelstrom gang implant their bodies to the extreme with powerful and highly illegal cyberware. If you don't want their blood-red mechanical eys to be the last thing you see, better play by their rules, and show some respect.

The Mox - The Mox isn't as big or as territorial as other gangs, but they are a force. Make no mistake, however - they are no saints. Their brand of protection is neither bloodless nor free, nor is it devoid of its own share of shady dealings.

Voodoo Boys - No-one else in Night City is so closely intertwined with the depths of the Net than the Voodoo Boys. They're your go-to for access beyond Blackwall, but watch your back; they're especially wary of strangers.

6th Street Gang - 6th Street started out as the good guys; a force that would stand up to the corporations and gangs territorizing the local community where the NCPD would or could not. Now they run Santo Domingo and they're just as self-serving and self-righteous about it as the rest of the worst out there in the Night City.

Animals - Where most people in Night City rely on cutting-edge cyberware and guns to get ahead, the Animals are all about maximising their innate muscle power.
Valentinos - Loyalty, family, and having each other's backs are at the core of the Valentinos credo. They how how to have fun, but cause trouble on their turf and you'll have a whole lot of barrio to answer to.
